LanguageData.ROM_RaidCosmicHorrors.label: horror assault
LanguageData.ROM_StarVampireAttack.label: star vampire attack
LanguageData.ROM_StarVampireAttack.letterText: An eerie calm has washed over the land. Something is coming.
LanguageData.ROM_DarkYoung.label: dark young
LanguageData.ROM_ChthonianPit.label: strange sinkhole (chthonian)
LanguageData.ROM_ChthonianPit.letterText:
A massive sinkhole has opened up near your colony.

A colossal beast writhes beneath, clawing at the minds of your colony with unseen fingers.

It demands a sacrifice. Feed it or destroy it quickly.
